text: Kare-ra wa jibun ga mu shinkona yo ni, anata gata mo mu shinko ni nari,(kare-ra no) dorui ni naru koto o nozomu.Dakara kare-ra ga arra no michi ni utsutte kuru made wa, kare-ra no naka kara (shitashi) tomo o ete wa naranai. Moshi kare-ra ga se o mukerunaraba, tokoro kamawazu kare-ra o torae, mitsuke shidai kare-ra o korose. Kare-ra no naka kara kesshite tomo ya enjo-sha o ete wa naranai
